metadata.title: CVE-2024-36958 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: NFSD:Fix nfsd4_encode_fattr4() crasher Ensure that args.acl is initializedearly. It is used in an unconditional call to kfree() on the way out ofnfsd4_encode_fattr4().

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
